Read PURPLE CNV Somatic File

Source: R/purple.R
purple_cnv_som_read.Rd

Reads the purple.cnv.somatic.tsv file, which contains the copy number profile of all (contiguous) segments of the tumor sample (see this table).

purple_cnv_som_read(x)

Arguments

x

Path to purple.cnv.somatic.tsv file.

Value

The input file as a tibble.

Examples

x <- system.file("extdata/purple/purple.cnv.somatic.tsv", package = "gpgr")
(p <- purple_cnv_som_read(x))

#> # A tibble: 59 x 16
#>    chromosome  start    end copyNumber bafCount observedBAF   baf
#>    <chr>       <int>  <int>      <dbl>    <dbl>       <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1 chr1       1.00e0 1.24e8       1.02    20830       0.792 0.982
#>  2 chr1       1.24e8 2.00e8       1.99    10239       0.540 0.503
#>  3 chr1       2.00e8 2.00e8       2.83        0       0     0.649
#>  4 chr1       2.00e8 2.49e8       2.01    10341       0.540 0.505
#>  5 chr2       1.00e0 9.31e7       2.01    19339       0.54  0.505
#>  6 chr2       9.31e7 2.20e8       2.00    19047       0.540 0.503
#>  7 chr2       2.20e8 2.25e8       1.02     1284       0.791 0.981
#>  8 chr2       2.25e8 2.42e8       2.03     4236       0.539 0.511
#>  9 chr3       1.00e0 9.22e7       1.03    18629       0.792 0.983
#> 10 chr3       9.22e7 1.98e8       2.00    21114       0.539 0.504
